page.title: 09SHOPPING IN CHESTERFIELD 2
page.content:
{(4) HOW DO YOU TRAVEL TO CHESTERFIELD?
CAR BUS WALK CYCLE
16 30 0 0
The survey revealed that all the shoppers used either{bus}or{car}to get into Chesterfield.{Buses}were the most popular form of transport. There is a very good service from Holymoorside (3 buses/hour). Local fares are also quite cheap.
The{car}was the second most popular form of transport. The main advantage is convenience. However problems of parking and high petrol costs may explain why it is not the most popular.
